</td></tr>

</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5d/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_5.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413110339" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5d/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413110339" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 5.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_5.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5d/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413110339"></a></span>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="41" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 4.png" data-image-key="Burbank_4.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"The landing pads around the island are built out of special alloys that disable them from being adversely affected by jet pack heat," explains Gary. "That means they're strong."
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_6">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/6.swf">6</a>
</td>
<td>PIZZA CHEF
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413110344" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413110344" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 6.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_6.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413110344"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"First you start with the pizza dough, which gets flattened into pans," the chef continues. "Then it goes down the Pizzatron 3000 line and roasts in the oven."
</td></tr>

</td>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>

</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"This one's my favorite story in the Book Room because it's about <a href="/wiki/Halloween_Parties" title="Halloween Parties">my favorite day of the year</a>," he says. "Besides, I love any story that involves aliens and flashlights."
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>"The Mine is so cool. I can see all kinds of stalactites on the ceiling," explains the scientist. "Stalactites are those things that look like icicles. Oh wait... they're just icicles."
</td></tr>

</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b4/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_9.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413111930" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b4/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_9.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413111930" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 9.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_9.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b4/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_9.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413111930"></a></span>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"It's amazing what you can do with a plain old drill," notes a worker on a job site near the coast. "I've seen some nice <a href="/wiki/Red_Hard_Hat" title="Red Hard Hat">red ones</a>, but I like my trusty yellow drill. It does just the trick."
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="45" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 2.png" data-image-key="Burbank_2.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"It's the perfect day for a hike in the Forest," says the penguin, holding her <a href="/wiki/Hiking_Backpack" title="Hiking Backpack">backpack</a> on her shoulders. "Keeping active is really important, plus I love the great outdoors!"
</td></tr>

<td>"Here comes a long one!" one penguin shouts. "Yikes! That was close!" shrieks the other penguin. "Guess I'm better with water balloons..."
</td></tr>

</td></tr>

</td></tr>

</td></tr>

<tr id="card_30">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/30.swf">30</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/Ice_Fishing" title="Ice Fishing">ICE FISHING</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_30.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413112209" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 30.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_30.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_30.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413112209"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="45" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 2.png" data-image-key="Burbank_2.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"I think the last time I was here, I caught about 10 fish," he replies. "I'm not in a rush when I go fishing. To me, it's about fun, not finance. If I need coins, I help at the Pet Shop."
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"You totally saved my feathers there," sighs the relieved <a href="/wiki/Rookie" title="Rookie">rookie agent</a>. "I thought I was never going to get back into the <a href="/wiki/Coin_Vault" title="Coin Vault">vault</a> after I closed the door! Oops, I guess!"
</td></tr>

<tr id="card_36">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/36.swf">36</a>

<td><a href="/wiki/Black_Puffle" title="Black Puffle">BLACK PUFFLE</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/2c/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_36.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413112251" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 36.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_36.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/2c/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_36.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413112251"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 5.png" data-image-key="Burbank_5.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"Turbo is my black puffle. It rolls its eyes a lot," replies the penguin as he feeds his pet a flipper full of Puffle O's. "It really gets fired up when I take it out for a walk."
</td></tr>

<tr id="card_42">

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"Oh! Look at that one over there blowing bubbles! That one is sooo cute  it should be my pet," she exclaims. "I'll name it Princess Purple because I love princesses and purple!"
</td></tr>

</td></tr>
<tr id="card_48">

<tr id="card_54">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/54.swf">54</a>

<td><a href="/wiki/Klutzy" title="Klutzy">KLUTZY</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b5/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_54.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413113124" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b5/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_54.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413113124" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 54.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_54.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b5/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_54.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413113124"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="8"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="42" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 8.png" data-image-key="Burbank_8.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>Klutzy: "CLICK CLICK CLICK."<br><a href="/wiki/Crab_Translator_3000" title="Crab Translator 3000">Crab Translator 3000</a>: "I'm hungry."<br>Klutzy: "CLA-CLICKA-CLICK CLICK-CLICK."<br>Crab Translator 3000: "I'm still hungry."
</td></tr>

</td>

</td>
<td>"Ooooh eee oooooh!" sing the carolers as they practice their songs to serenade the town. During the holidays, the trees are trimmed with fresh snow and holiday cheer echoes throughout the island.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_60">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/60.swf">60</a>

<td><a href="/wiki/Beta_Test_Party" title="Beta Test Party">BETA PARTY</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/8a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_60.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413113210" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/8a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_60.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413113210" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 60.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_60.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/8a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_60.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413113210"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="8"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="42" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 8.png" data-image-key="Burbank_8.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045454" class="mw-file-description image" title="Orange"><img alt="Orange" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ orange card.png" data-image-key="CJ_orange_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454"></a><figcaption>Orange</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"We didn't have many decorations <a href="/wiki/List_of_Parties_and_Events_in_2005" title="List of Parties and Events in 2005">then</a>  just a simple banner," explains a penguin wearing a <a href="/wiki/Party_Hat" title="Party Hat">party hat</a>. "But we wanted to celebrate our hard work somehow, and penguins love a good party!"
</td></tr>

<td>HIDDEN ITEMS
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/55/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_61.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413113218" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/55/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_61.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413113218" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 61.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_61.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/55/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_61.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413113218"></a></span>

<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"I found the hidden <a href="/wiki/Viking_Helmet" title="Viking Helmet">viking helmet</a>!" he says, leafing through the latest issue of <i>Penguin Style</i>. "I'm totally going to add this to my pirate policeman outfit. What do you think?"
</td></tr>

<tr id="card_66">

<tr id="card_105">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/105.swf">105</a>

<td><a href="/wiki/Ed_McCool" title="Ed McCool">ED MCCOOL</a> AND <a href="/wiki/Destructo" title="Destructo">DESTRUCTO</a>

</td></tr>
<tr id="card_111">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/111.swf">111</a>
</td>
<td>METEOR PUFFLE
</td>

It all begins with Card-Jitsu, and this <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fourth_wall" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Fourth wall">card you hold in your hand</a>. Proceed to the Dojo, and take your first step on a legendary path...
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>Puffles are the cute little furballs you see penguins waddling around with next to them. You can even take them into games like <a href="/wiki/Aqua_Grabber" title="Aqua Grabber">Aqua Grabber</a>! Drop by the Pet Shop in the Plaza to adopt one of your very own.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_210">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/210.swf">210</a>
</td>
<td>Rock &amp; Roll Suit
</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>This trendy outfit is popular for its sparkle and "pizzazz!" It was first released in the Gift Shop, just before <a href="/wiki/Music_Jam_2008" title="Music Jam 2008">Music Jam '08</a>, one of the biggest parties of the year.
</td></tr>

<tr id="card_216">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/216.swf">216</a>

<td>Beach Chair Chilling
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/2b/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_216.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413114428" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/2b/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_216.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413114428" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 216.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_216.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/2b/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_216.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413114428"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 3.png" data-image-key="Burbank_3.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>"Chilling out" at the Beach is even easier when the beach is made of snow. Sun glasses are optional, but you add that touch of "cool" while you "chill."
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>"If you look through the telescope at the Beacon, you can see all the way out to sea. It's a good place to keep a close eye out for Rockhopper."
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">3

<td>"Don't give me that look..." said the penguin. "It's just a costume. I'm trying to get a part in <a href="/wiki/The_Twelfth_Fish" title="The Twelfth Fish">a play</a> at the Stage, and I need expert advice. Now are you going to help me or not?"
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>Yarr's favorite place on the Migrator is up in the Crow's Net. You can see for miles, and take out any rogue icebergs with the ship's snowball cannon.
</td></tr>

</td></tr>

<tr id="card_222">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/222.swf">222</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/Iceberg" title="Iceberg">Iceberg</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/cd/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_222.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413114517" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 222.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_222.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/cd/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_222.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413114517"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="8"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="42" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 8.png" data-image-key="Burbank_8.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>"If we tipped this over, what do you think we'd find on the other side?" one penguin inquires. "It's the biggest mystery of all," they replied. "We've got to find a way to tip it.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>The Lounge is located upstairs from the Night Club, and it's the perfect place to "chill" and play arcade games. Can you master the tricky "Thin Ice" or pilot the "Astro Barrier" to victory?
</td></tr>

Ye might want to <a href="/wiki/Book_Room" title="Book Room">"book"</a> some time to find it..."

<td><a href="/wiki/Ruby_and_the_Ruby" title="Ruby and the Ruby">Ruby and the Ruby</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/68/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_228.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413114610" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 228.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_228.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/68/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_228.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413114610"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>

<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>"See, here's the shimmy  this classy lady named <a href="/wiki/Ruby" title="Ruby">Ruby</a> had lost her <a href="/wiki/Ruby_Pin" class="mw-redirect" title="Ruby Pin">ruby</a>. A victim of poetic irony, I know. She needed my help, and she needed it fast..." -<a href="/wiki/Jacques_Hammer" title="Jacques Hammer">Jacques Hammer</a>
</td></tr>

I wear the sheep costume and my buddy dresses up like the <a href="/wiki/Prince_Redhood" title="Prince Redhood">prince</a> from the story and we make up our own plays in the Forest."
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_234">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/234.swf">234</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/Jelly_Fish" class="mw-redirect" title="Jelly Fish">Jelly Fish</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/49/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_234.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413114700" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/49/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_234.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413114700" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 234.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_234.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/49/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_234.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413114700"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 3.png" data-image-key="Burbank_3.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>These rare Antarctic jelly fish can produce a small electric charge that can make for a 'shocking' experience for Ice Fishing experts who may snag one on their line.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>The fish around Club Penguin won't just up and eat and old bait. In fact, each kind of fish has their own favorite food. Fishing experts recommend trying different types of bait for best results.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>"Though puffles enjoy cookies, and a stick of gum now and then, their favorite food is Puffle O's, without a doubt," said the <a href="/wiki/Puffle_Handler" title="Puffle Handler">Puffle Handler</a>. "Make sure not to overfeed them though, because they might get a tummy ache."
</td></tr>

</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>"Once a year the Fall Fair comes to Club Penguin with a whole bunch of special games," said the Tour Guide. "These games award tickets you can trade for sweet prizes. And I mean 'sweet.' Their cotton candy is delicious!"
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_240">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/240.swf">240</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/Thingamajig" title="Thingamajig">Thinga-ma-jig 3000</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7b/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_240.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413114756" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 240.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_240.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7b/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_240.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413114756"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 5.png" data-image-key="Burbank_5.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>"Oh, you've heard of the Thing-ma-jig 3000?" Gary asked. "Oh yes, it's quite a clever little device, but it's hidden away in my Gadget Room. It's so well hidden in that you'd have to be some kind of secret agent to find it."
</td></tr>

<td>This unique Halloween costume first appeared in October 2008, when Gary the Gadget Guy was working on the <a href="/wiki/Monster_Maker_3000" title="Monster Maker 3000">Monster Maker 3000</a> invention in his <a href="/wiki/Secret_Laboratory" title="Secret Laboratory">secret lab</a>. "Spookalicious!"

<td><a href="/wiki/Raoul_3000" title="Raoul 3000">Coffee Machine</a>

<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/bf/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_304.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413115200" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/bf/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_304.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413115200" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 304.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_304.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/bf/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_304.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413115200"></a></span>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>Secret Agents will find this machine in the Coffee Shop during the <a href="/wiki/Secret_of_the_Fur" class="mw-redirect" title="Secret of the Fur">Secret of the Fur</a> mission. It will help you save the island.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>You'll find this at the Stage  and it's never empty! Open it and choose an outfit. You could be <a href="/wiki/Alaska" title="Alaska">a brave explorer</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Norman_Swarm" title="Norman Swarm">scientist</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Toby_the_Lobster" title="Toby the Lobster">lobster</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Shadow_Guy" title="Shadow Guy">he</a><a href="/wiki/Gamma_Gal" title="Gamma Gal">ro</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Chester" title="Chester">time traveler</a>... anything you want!<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>Penguins with outdoor areas for their igloos can throw amazing parties. Check out <i>Better Igloos</i> for cool furniture, like this <a href="/wiki/Barbecue" title="Barbecue">BBQ</a>. Oh the <a href="/wiki/Penguin_Gnome" title="Penguin Gnome">gnome</a>? Every party should have one!
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_310">

<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>You never know who will sell you a ticket for the latest Stage performance at the Plaza. Sometimes actors man the booth between shows!
</td></tr>

</td>

<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="45" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 2.png" data-image-key="Burbank_2.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>This ginormous rocking horse somehow found itself upstairs in the Lodge Attic. To see it for yourself, go to the Ski Village and climb the ladder inside the Ski Lodge.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>There's new stuff in this catalog every month! Why not get your friends together in the Gift Shop and check it out? Pick out new outfits, then hold a fashion show in your igloo!
</td></tr>

</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>There's two secret passages to the underground. You'll find this one in the Plaza. To find the other passage, head to <a href="/wiki/Night_Club" title="Night Club">the room with the best beats</a> and pay attention to the speaker on the far right.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>This cool lead guitarist of Penguin Band loves to hang out with other music fans around the island. Find him with his bandmates Backstage during Music Jam and receive an autographed background.
</td></tr>

"BUT NEVER DOUBT I BLUB!"
</td></tr>

<td>Plasma Glow Wave
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/75/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_327.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413115502" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/75/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_327.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413115502" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 327.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_327.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/75/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_327.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413115502"></a></span>
</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>You can light up the Stage with Gamma Gal's incredible Plasma Glow Wave during every performance of <i>Shadow Guy and Gamma Gal vs. Squidzoid</i>. Wear the costume and wave to activate the special power.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/9/96/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_332.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413120410" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 332.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_332.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/9/96/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_332.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413120410"></a></span>

</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>The <a href="/wiki/Color_Vote_2009" class="mw-redirect" title="Color Vote 2009">2009 color vote</a> was an epic battle between <a href="/wiki/Lavender" title="Lavender">Lavender</a>, <a href="/wiki/Maroon" title="Maroon">Maroon</a> and <a href="/wiki/Aqua" title="Aqua">Aqua</a>. Penguins voted in the Forest and the <a href="/wiki/Aqua" title="Aqua">winning color</a> was added to the <i>Penguin Style</i> catalog as a new penguin color.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_333">

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>The captain of the <i>Migrator</i> brought these plants to the island in 2009. Penguins put them in their igloos and they started to grow! Every few weeks they change  even to this day!
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>

<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>During this June 2009 party, after Rockhopper's plants took over the island, penguin explorers discovered rare flowers  some that changed colors and others that liked to <a href="/wiki/Snowball_Eating_Plant" title="Snowball Eating Plant">eat snowballs</a>!
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_339">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/339.swf">339</a>
</td>

<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045454" class="mw-file-description image" title="Orange"><img alt="Orange" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ orange card.png" data-image-key="CJ_orange_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454"></a><figcaption>Orange</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>Penguins called this one of 2009's coolest events. They voted for their favorite stage plays, got to meet Penguin Band and Aunt Arctic, and enjoyed dressing up to receive their own awards!
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="8"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="42" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 8.png" data-image-key="Burbank_8.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>Penguins flew for the first time when they danced while wearing this item at the 2006 April Fool's Day Party. Penguins aren't the only ones who like these caps though  check out the green puffles!
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 3.png" data-image-key="Burbank_3.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">5
</td>
<td>Skilled ninjas show their mastery of the element of fire, battling with hot sauce. They never spill a drop on their ninja suit and they don't fear it on their pizza.
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>

<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">5
</td>
<td>Only ninjas can access this quaint little shop at the heart of the Ninja Hideout beside the Dojo. The magical Amulet is the most popular item sold here.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>Land on this square in a game of Card-Jitsu Fire, and youll face a battle against another ninja. Remember, fire beats snow, snow beats water, water beats fire.
</td></tr>

</td></tr>

</td></tr>
<tr id="card_414">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/414.swf">414</a>
</td>
<td>Fire Wheel (named "Stoking The Volcano" in real-life cards)
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/cd/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_414.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413121314" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 414.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_414.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/cd/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_414.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413121314"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">5
</td>
<td>Ninjas gathered fiery items from all around the island to make the Volcano even hotter. It sparked great events, starting with a great storm which hit the island just before Halloween.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">5
</td>
<td>Here's a hot tip if you're a Fire Ninja, wear these 4 items: <a href="/wiki/Flame_Sandals" title="Flame Sandals">Flame Sandals</a>, <a href="/wiki/Magma_Coat" title="Magma Coat">Magma Coat</a>, <a href="/wiki/Lava_Mask" title="Lava Mask">Lava Mask</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Fiery_Helmet" title="Fiery Helmet">Fiery Helmet</a>. Then hit D on your keyboard. Behold the Fire Stance!
</td></tr>

<tr id="card_420">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/420.swf">420</a>

<td>Sketched: Volcano (named "Fire Dojo Sketch" in real-life cards)
</td>

<td>Sensei first appeared outside the Dojo in <a href="/wiki/Dig_Out_the_Dojo" title="Dig Out the Dojo">November 2008</a>, where he was seen digging snow with a shovel. Almost a year later, he helped awaken the great Volcano...
</td></tr>

Once you have mastered the element of fire, the Fire Gem will glow!<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>

<tr id="card_426">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/426.swf">426</a>
</td>
<td>Sensei Fire (named "<a href="/wiki/Sensei%27s_Fire_Suit" title="Sensei's Fire Suit">Sensei's Fire Robes</a>" in real-life cards)
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/69/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_426.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413121505" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 426.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_426.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/69/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_426.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413121505"></a></span>
</td>

<td data-sort-value="9"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Burbank_9.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024946" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="44" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 9.png" data-image-key="Burbank_9.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Burbank_9.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024946"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">5
</td>
<td>Sensei is a master of Card-Jitsu Fire. As you challenge other ninja students and earn experience, Sensei will award you with pieces of the Fire Ninja Suit.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/10/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_506.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413121620" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 506.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_506.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/10/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_506.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413121620"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>During the Halloween Party, penguins looking to show off their custom costumes can waddle over to the costume show. Monsters and ladybugs alike are welcome!
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Soccer is a very popular pastime on the island. Whether two or twenty two penguins are playing, the action is always epic. Get your game on at the Stadium!
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Unloading the Coffee Shop truck is one of the oldest jobs on the island. And as long as penguins need their coffee, the Coffee Shop will need someone to help unload the beans.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>As part of the <a href="/wiki/Earth_Day_2010" title="Earth Day 2010">Earth Day celebration</a>, penguins decided to help clean up the island. A new <a href="/wiki/Recycling_Plant" title="Recycling Plant">Recycling Depot</a> was built, and everyone took part in a huge <a href="/wiki/Scavenger_Hunt#Recycle_Hunt_2010" title="Scavenger Hunt">recycling scavenger hunt</a>.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>To play soccer at the Stadium, you've got to be quick. Click on the soccer ball to run over and kick it. The faster you're going, the faster the ball will go!
</td></tr>

<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/c5/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_512.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413121714" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 512.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_512.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/c5/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_512.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413121714"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>These are sketches of characters from "Secrets of the Bamboo Forest". We drew lots of different designs for their costumes before we decided on these ones.
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>When a <a href="/wiki/List_of_disasters_in_Club_Penguin#Rockslide" title="List of disasters in Club Penguin">rockslide in the Mine</a> revealed hidden caves, crews moved in to make them safe to explore. "We're off to a rocky start," said Rory, "but that's normal for a cave."
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Revealed by a rockslide in January of 2010, this dark cave is a construction worker's dream. Penguins can mine for gold with jackhammers, or help keep the lights powered with snowballs.
</td></tr>
