<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_518.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122126" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 518.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_518.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_518.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122126"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>The Puffle Show premiered during the Puffle Party in 2010. Penguins took their furry friends there to compete in an exciting obstacle course.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_519">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/519.swf">519</a>
</td>
<td>Holiday Gifts
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/9/93/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_519.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122135" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 519.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_519.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/9/93/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_519.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122135"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="7"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5a/Burbank_7.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="47" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 7.png" data-image-key="Burbank_7.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5a/Burbank_7.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>During the <a href="/wiki/Holiday_Party_2009" title="Holiday Party 2009">Holiday Party in 2009</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Happy_Christmas_postcard" title="Happy Christmas postcard">special postcard</a> allowed penguins to send a gift to their friends. Wrapped inside each was a <a href="/wiki/Candy_Cane_Hat" title="Candy Cane Hat">Candy Cane Hat</a>.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_520">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/520.swf">520</a>
</td>
<td>Holiday Activities
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/c3/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_520.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122142" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 520.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_520.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/c3/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_520.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122142"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Even during the colder months, many penguins enjoy bundling up and playing in the snow. Making snowmen, caroling and snowball fights are very popular activities during this time.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_521">

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>The Stadium was upgraded to allow bigger crows to attend hockey and soccer games. Complete with bleachers, new lighting and booths for food vendors.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Nothing spruces up an igloo like a few items from the Better Igloos catalog. Puffles especially love it when there are lots of things to play with.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Music Jam is the island's annual music festival. It's all about finding the right styles, sounds and moves to express yourself.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_524">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/524.swf">524</a>
</td>
<td>Elite Penguin Sketch
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_524.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122215" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 524.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_524.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_524.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122215"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>This sketch shows an Elite Agent locating his <a href="/wiki/Field-Op" title="Field-Op">Field-Op</a>. We wanted to show the <a href="/wiki/EPF_Spy_Phone" class="mw-redirect" title="EPF Spy Phone">Spy Phone</a> up close, and we thought it looked best having an agent hold it from the top.
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>During the Festival of Flight, penguins celebrated the many different ways to fly. They used <a href="/wiki/Jet_Pack_(item)" title="Jet Pack (item)">jetpacks</a>, <a href="/wiki/Green_Propeller_Cap" title="Green Propeller Cap">propeller hats</a>, hot air balloons, and more to get the island "off the ground".
</td></tr>

</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/530.swf">530</a>

<td><a href="/wiki/Orange_Puffle" title="Orange Puffle">Orange Puffle</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/2c/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_530.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122303" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 530.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_530.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/2c/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_530.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122303"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>The zaniest of all puffles, these curious creatures were first discovered at the <a href="/wiki/Puffle_Party_2010" title="Puffle Party 2010">Puffle Party in 2010</a>. Their buckteeth and quirky personalities make them stand out in any crowd.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_531">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/531.swf">531</a>
</td>
<td>Community Tree
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_531.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122315" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 531.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_531.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_531.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122315"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045454" class="mw-file-description image" title="Orange"><img alt="Orange" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ orange card.png" data-image-key="CJ_orange_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454"></a><figcaption>Orange</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>The entire community of Club Penguin helped plant this special tree during the Earth Day celebration in 2010. Many believe it will be the tallest tree on the island someday.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_532">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/532.swf">532</a>
</td>
<td>Community Garden
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/16/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_532.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122324" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 532.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_532.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/16/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_532.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122324"></a></span>

<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Many penguins have a passion for gardening. So during the Earth Day celebration in 2010, a community garden was planted at the Mine Shack. Now anyone can go there and plant vegetables!
</td></tr>

</td>

<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>In June of 2010, penguins were invited to dress up as pirates, captains, and even castaways. Mermaids and sailors in seafaring dresses were also spotted during the celebration.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>Shops in Igloos
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_534.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122340" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 534.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_534.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_534.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122340"></a></span>

<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>In 2010, the Better Igloos catalog began selling <a href="/wiki/Clothes_Rack" title="Clothes Rack">clothing racks</a> and displays so penguins could set up their own shops. Now there are many unique and interesting showing up all over the island,
</td></tr>

</td>

</td>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>A popular costume during the Island Adventure Party. The Seafarer's Gown and <a href="/wiki/The_Bonny_Curls" title="The Bonny Curls">Bonny Curls</a> were perfect for any gal that wanted to sail while looking their best.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_536">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/536.swf">536</a>
</td>
<td>Music Jam Dancers
</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Music Jam is about more than just music! The island's annual festival is about finding the best styles and sounds to express yourself, including your best dance moves.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/3b/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_542.png/revision/latest?cb=20210428002714" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 542.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_542.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/3b/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_542.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20210428002714"></a></span>
</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>This is an average Everyday Phoning Facility, over in the Ski Village. There's nothing to see here... unless you happen to receive <a href="/wiki/EPF_Recruitment_postcard" title="EPF Recruitment postcard">an invitation</a> to the Elite Penguin Force...
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/548.swf">548</a>

<td>April Fools
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/c1/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_548.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122724" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="97" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 548.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_548.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/c1/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_548.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122724"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="7"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5a/Burbank_7.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="47" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 7.png" data-image-key="Burbank_7.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5a/Burbank_7.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>April Fools is a strange but funny celebration in Club Penguin. There's all sorts of weird silliness happening. It's easy to join in,-pull a prank, or tell a crazy joke.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_549">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/549.swf">549</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/The_Great_Snow_Maze" title="The Great Snow Maze">The Great Snow Maze</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/1e/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_549.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122735" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 549.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_549.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/1e/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_549.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122735"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="45" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 2.png" data-image-key="Burbank_2.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>During November of 2009, penguins were invited to solve the Great Snow Maze. Many penguins worked together to reach the end, and were awarded with a <a href="/wiki/Yeti_Costume" title="Yeti Costume">Yeti costume</a>.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>This penguin private investigator is one of the stars of the Stage play "Ruby and the Ruby". He's a no-nonsense penguin who doesn't miss a clue, and always finds what he's looking for.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>During the April Fools Party, the entire island goes topsy-turvy. Those who join in the fun may even be crowned the King of April Fools... though kings are crowned every few minutes.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>To join the Elite Penguin Force, first you must complete The Test. This Test will challenge all of an agent's skills, including their speed, stealth and how clever they are.
</td></tr>

<td>Super Exclusives
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f7/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_554.png/revision/latest?cb=20210428002943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 554.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_554.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f7/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_554.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20210428002943"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 3.png" data-image-key="Burbank_3.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>These ultra-rare items are only available to those who have entered at least 5 codes into the Treasure Book. Codes can be found on games, books and other Club Penguin toys.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_555">

</td>
<td>Rockslide at the Mine
</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>In January 2010, the whole island was surprised by a rockslide in the Mine. Construction crews quickly cleaned up the mess, and discovered a number of hidden caves.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>One of the many hazards that Aqua Grabber pilots need to avoid. These puffer fish can inflate to almost a hundred times their normal size, and their spikes can do a lot of damage.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>Released during the Earth Day celebration in 2010, this <a href="/wiki/Water_Suit_3000" title="Water Suit 3000">watering pack</a> keeps water from freezing, now penguins can water their gardens no matter how cold it is.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>

</td></tr>
<tr id="card_560">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/560.swf">560</a>

</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/1d/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_560.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413122917" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 560.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_560.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/1d/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_560.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413122917"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Come one, come all, to the great Puffle Circus! Only in town during the Fair, penguins can see puffles of all colors perform amazing acts!
</td></tr>

</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>One of the more unusual igloo designs, the Fishbowl Igloo lets you see the world from the eyes of a Fluffy fish. It can be found from time to time in the Better Igloos catalog.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Deep underground is a secret cave filled with water, called the Hidden Lake. To find it, you'll need to journey into the caves beyond the mine, or find the other hidden entrance...
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_601">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/601.swf">601</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/Igloo_Contests#Halloween_Igloo_Contest_3" title="Igloo Contests">Spooky Igloo Contest</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/14/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_601.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413123542" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 601.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_601.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/1/14/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_601.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413123542"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="45" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 2.png" data-image-key="Burbank_2.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/70/Burbank_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>October 2010 saw a return of the spooky igloo contest. Penguins who picked up costumes and furniture items can keep the spine-chilling style all year 'round.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_602">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/602.swf">602</a>
</td>
<td>Halloween Countdown! (named "Halloween Countdown" in real-life cards)
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/88/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_602.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413123556" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 602.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_602.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/88/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_602.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413123556"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024943" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 3.png" data-image-key="Burbank_3.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e2/Burbank_3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024943"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>We prepared for Halloween 2010 with a chilling countdown and creepy costumes. Then, we searched for candy in the Swamp Quest.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_603">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/603.swf">603</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/List_of_disasters_in_Club_Penguin#The_Great_Storm_of_2010" title="List of disasters in Club Penguin">Stormy Skies</a>
</td>

<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Stormy skies rolled over the island and cast shadows over October 2010's Halloween festivities. In November the dark clouds burst with the first ever rain in Club Penguin.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>October 24th 2010 was the 5th Anniversary Party in Club Penguin. Penguins earned a <a href="/wiki/Celebration_Stamp" class="mw-redirect" title="Celebration Stamp">Celebration Stamp</a> for blowing out the candles on the massive cake in the Coffee Shop.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Club Penguin turned five at the October 24th Anniversary Party! Penguins found a <a href="/wiki/5th_Year_Party_Hat" title="5th Year Party Hat">party hat</a> and orange puffles were excited to share the giant Anniversary cake.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>During the Anniversary Party of 2010, we celebrated the past year with a brand new Yearbook and original penguin artwork in the Book Room.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_607">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/607.swf">607</a>
</td>
<td>Snowball Fight! (named "Snowball Fight" in real-life cards)
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/07/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_607.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413123655" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 607.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_607.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/07/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_607.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413123655"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Snowball: a ball of snow pressed together to throw. Or... an excuse to get your snow gear on and head to the Snow Forts for a frozen fight!
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Challenge your buddy to a game of Find Four in the Ski Lodge. While you're there, you may also see a giant mullet, a moose head and <a href="/wiki/Fred" class="mw-redirect" title="Fred">Fred the Cuckoo</a> clock bird.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>The brown puffle pet is super smart, inventive, and wears safety goggles. It's a good thing because its rocket is a bit unpredictable.
</td></tr>

<tr id="card_619">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/619.swf">619</a>

<td><a href="/wiki/Pink_Sparkly_Snowshoes" title="Pink Sparkly Snowshoes">Pink Sparkle Snowshoes</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/24/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_619.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413123911" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 619.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_619.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/24/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_619.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413123911"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>In January 2011 the Pink Sparkly Snowshoes hit Penguin Style just in time for the Wilderness Expedition. Who says exploration gear can't be stylish?
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/625.swf">625</a>

<td><a href="/wiki/Celebration_of_Water" class="mw-redirect" title="Celebration of Water">Water Party</a> Prep
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/d2/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_625.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413124016" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 625.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_625.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/d2/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_625.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413124016"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>In November 2010, even before the rain clouds flooded the island, <a href="/wiki/Penguin_Style#Penguins_at_Work" title="Penguin Style">penguins at work</a> were finding leaks and looking for messes to <a href="/wiki/Mop_and_Bucket" title="Mop and Bucket">mop</a>.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Brave ninjas can battle opponents at the Waterfall behind the Dojo and earn <a href="/wiki/Water_Suit" title="Water Suit">Water Suits</a>. Press 'D' when you wear only your suit and demonstrate your power to control water.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/631.swf">631</a>

<td><a href="/wiki/Fairy_Fables" title="Fairy Fables">Fairy Fables</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e4/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_631.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413124123" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 631.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_631.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e4/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_631.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413124123"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045454" class="mw-file-description image" title="Orange"><img alt="Orange" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ orange card.png" data-image-key="CJ_orange_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454"></a><figcaption>Orange</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>September 2010 saw a return of the popular Fairy Fables play at the Stage. Penguins interested in acting auditioned for the roles of characters like Twee and the Big Bad Wool.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_632">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/632.swf">632</a>
</td>
<td>Penguins That Time Forgot<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/8d/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_632.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413124131" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 632.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_632.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/8d/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_632.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413124131"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="8"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="42" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 8.png" data-image-key="Burbank_8.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>"Penguins That Time Forgot" hit the Stage again in January 2011. Actors clamored to the Costume Trunk to get their <a href="/wiki/Cheap_Time_Travel_Hat" title="Cheap Time Travel Hat">Time-Traveler's hats</a>, <a href="/wiki/Blue_Tiki_Mask" title="Blue Tiki Mask">Tiki</a> <a href="/wiki/Pink_Tiki_Mask" title="Pink Tiki Mask">Masks</a> and their <a href="/wiki/Big_Brow" title="Big Brow">Big Brows</a>.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_633">

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>This sketch was created when the Elite Penguin Force agents started doing Field Ops in June 2010. Secret agents work together to get things done.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>The Cove is a place we go to tell stories and play the Catchin' Waves game. If you've taken on the waves there, you've probably got some extreme tales to tell.
</td></tr>

</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>The first ever game in Club Penguin, Hydro Hopper was formerly known as Ballistic Biscuit. Head to the Dock to grab your inner tube and challenge the waters.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_637">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/637.swf">637</a>
</td>
<td>Igloo Party!
</td>

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>To change up your igloo, choose a new design, get some furniture items, and decorate. Then throw a party and invite your friends.

<td>Herbert made his first appearance in the PSA mission "<a href="/wiki/Questions_for_a_Crab" class="mw-redirect" title="Questions for a Crab">Questions for a Crab</a>". After capturing a Secret Agent, he explained his life story and dastardly plans. His flow chart contained over 30 hand drawn pages.

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Fireworks filled the sky during <a href="/wiki/New_Year%27s_Day_2010" title="New Year's Day 2010">2010's New Year's celebrations</a>. This particular image appeared on the front page of the December 21, 2010 edition of the <i>Club Penguin Times</i>.

<td>These three <a href="/wiki/Enemy_bots" title="Enemy bots">Boss Bugs</a> were sketched in the summer of 2010. The artists wanted them to look as if they could harm a computer system. Elite Agents can attack these Club Penguin enemies in System Defense in the Command Room.
</td></tr>

<td>During the Wilderness Expedition, we had to take a boat to get across the bay. But first we had to build it and put our <a href="/wiki/Life_Jacket_(ID_4292)" title="Life Jacket (ID 4292)">lifejackets</a> on!

<tr id="card_655">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/655.swf">655</a>
</td>
<td>Catch the Mullet! (named "Catch the Mullet" in real-life cards)
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/df/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_655.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413124834" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 655.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_655.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/df/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_655.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413124834"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="41" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 4.png" data-image-key="Burbank_4.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>From the Lodge, you can get to the Ice Fishing game and catch fish. Shhhh... To get the giant mullet use a smaller fish as bait!
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 5.png" data-image-key="Burbank_5.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Fairy Fables is the tale of Prince Redwood who rides through the forest to take croissants to a princess. Check the Stage for a trunk full of costumes and acting opportunities.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/662.swf">662</a>
</td>
<td>Creative Puffles
</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>First discovered in the Forest in 2007, yellow puffles are artistic pets. Adopt one from the Pet Shop and take it into your igloo. Then watch it get creative!
</td></tr>

<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/80/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_667.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125015" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 667.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_667.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/80/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_667.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125015"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 5.png" data-image-key="Burbank_5.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>This early sketch of the Water Dojo had a few more "polished" elements than it does now. We wanted the area to be quite rough and even a bit perilous to reflect the challenge of the water game.
</td></tr>

<td>"<a href="/wiki/Feed_A_Puffle" title="Feed A Puffle">Feed a Puffle</a>"
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b0/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_673.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125110" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 673.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_673.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b0/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_673.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125110"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="9"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Burbank_9.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024946" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="44" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 9.png" data-image-key="Burbank_9.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Burbank_9.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024946"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>All the puffles are hungry in the Club Penguin Wii "Feed A Puffle" Game. But try extra hard to feed a white one  you can get <a href="/wiki/White_Puffle_stamp" title="White Puffle stamp">a Stamp</a> in Club Penguin when you feed one.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>Ninja Battle

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Ninjas compete fiercely in the Dojo to improve their Card-Jitsu skills. After earning their Ninja Mask, many continue to battle to keep their senses sharp. New Power Cards can surprise even the most skilled opponents.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Sensei's past is shrouded in mystery. He is the first master of Card-Jitsu, but little else is known about him. He will, however gladly train any student interested in the ways of the ninja. Seek him in the Dojo for training.
</td></tr>
