<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Even after you've earned their Ninja Mask, your ninja's training has only begun. The next step of your journey is to master the elements. Search the Ninja Hideout for paths to new Dojos... and new challenges.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>The Brown Puffle was first discovered in January 2011. Explorers crossed a hidden bay into the wilds of Club Penguin, and found them in a cave. Many puffles even followed the explorers back. Adopt one today the Pet Shop.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Fire Ninjas who wear all the parts of their Fire Suit can control fire by pressing 'D' on their keyboard. Many used this power to help melt snow and pump water during the Water Dojo construction in November 2010.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_679">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/679.swf">679</a>
</td>
<td>Black Puffles in Cart Surfer
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/cb/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_679.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125214" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 679.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_679.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/cb/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_679.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125214"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="7"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5a/Burbank_7.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="47" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 7.png" data-image-key="Burbank_7.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5a/Burbank_7.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045454" class="mw-file-description image" title="Orange"><img alt="Orange" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ orange card.png" data-image-key="CJ_orange_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454"></a><figcaption>Orange</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>In October 2010, black puffles were found exploring the Mine. It was quickly discovered that they were interested in Cart Surfing. To take your black puffle along, just walk to the Mine and start a game.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_680">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/680.swf">680</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/Mountain_Expedition" title="Mountain Expedition">Mountain Expedition</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/09/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_680.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125227" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 680.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_680.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/09/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_680.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125227"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="41" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 4.png" data-image-key="Burbank_4.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>During August 2010, a Mountain Expedition was organized to climb to the top of Toughest Mountain. Many teams of penguins suited up with new climbing gear, and worked together to face the mountain.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_681">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/681.swf">681</a>
</td>
<td>Climbing the Mountain
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/32/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_681.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125236" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 681.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_681.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/32/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_681.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125236"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="41" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 4.png" data-image-key="Burbank_4.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045454" class="mw-file-description image" title="Orange"><img alt="Orange" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ orange card.png" data-image-key="CJ_orange_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454"></a><figcaption>Orange</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Climbers faced many obstacles during the Mountain Expedition in August 2010. Icy caverns and harsh weather made the climb very tiring. Many stopped to rest at base camp before climbing to the summit.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_682">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/682.swf">682</a>
</td>
<td>Top of <a href="/wiki/Toughest_Mountain" title="Toughest Mountain">Toughest Mountain</a> (named "Top of the Tallest Mountain" in real-life cards)
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ad/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_682.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125244" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 682.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_682.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ad/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_682.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125244"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 5.png" data-image-key="Burbank_5.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>The final challenge for climbers during the Mountain Expedition in August 2010 was to reach the top. Many who did took a picture to celebrate, which could then be used as a <a href="/wiki/Top_Of_The_Mountain_Background" title="Top Of The Mountain Background">player card background</a>!
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_683">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/683.swf">683</a>
</td>
<td>Cart Surfer Stamps
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/3a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_683.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125255" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 683.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_683.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/3a/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_683.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125255"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 6.png" data-image-key="Burbank_6.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/6a/Burbank_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>To earn all the Stamps in Cart Surfer, you'll need practice... and a little help. For some of the challenges, surfers will need to bring a black puffle with them. You can adopt one of these from the Pet Shop.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/684.swf">684</a>
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/Stamp_Book" class="mw-redirect" title="Stamp Book">Stamp Book</a>
</td>

<td data-sort-value="7"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5a/Burbank_7.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="47" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 7.png" data-image-key="Burbank_7.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/5a/Burbank_7.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Stamps Books tell YOUR story. Inside you'll find all the pins you've found, the games you've mastered, and the medals you've earned. Customize yours to show others what you like... and what you can do!
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_685">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/685.swf">685</a>
</td>
<td>Stormy Sky
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/d7/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_685.png/revision/latest?cb=20250307040830" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 685.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_685.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/d7/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_685.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20250307040830"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="8"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024945" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="42" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 8.png" data-image-key="Burbank_8.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/36/Burbank_8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024945"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045446" class="mw-file-description image" title="Green"><img alt="Green" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ green card.png" data-image-key="CJ_green_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_green_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045446"></a><figcaption>Green</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Dark and stormy skies continued to cover the island after the 2010 Halloween Party was over. No one could explain the mysterious weather at first  even Gary the Gadget Guy was baffled.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_686">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/686.swf">686</a>
</td>
<td>Water Wave Sketches
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_686.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125329" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 686.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_686.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_686.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125329"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045256" class="mw-file-description image" title="Snow"><img alt="Snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="46" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ snow icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_snow_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/5/51/CJ_snow_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045256"></a><figcaption>Snow</figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="41" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 4.png" data-image-key="Burbank_4.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>What do Water Ninjas look like when they're controlling water? That's the question we asked while working on these sketches. We tried lots of different designs, making the water look 'smooth' and 'froamy', until we found the way we liked best.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_687">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/687.swf">687</a>
</td>
<td>Storm Baffles Gary
</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>When the Halloween Storm arrived in October 2010, Gary the Gadget Guy was puzzled. "I had never experienced a storm like it before," he said. "I watched it closely through the binoculars at the Cove. It was very intriguing."
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Card-Jitsu Water is a fast paced battle. It takes quick thinking and fast flippers to master. Those who do will earn their Water Suit, a Water Gem, and the right to call themselves a Water Ninja.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_689">

</td>
<td>The First Rainstorm
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_689.png/revision/latest?cb=20250307040950" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 689.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_689.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_689.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20250307040950"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="41" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 4.png" data-image-key="Burbank_4.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>In November 2010, it rained for the first time in Club Penguin history. For days the downpour soaked the island. Weather experts were baffled, and penguins everywhere were spotted with umbrellas and rain gear.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_690">

</td>

</td>

<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045423" class="mw-file-description image" title="Yellow"><img alt="Yellow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ yellow card.png" data-image-key="CJ_yellow_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/3/34/CJ_yellow_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045423"></a><figcaption>Yellow</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Ninjas must give their all facing one another in battle. Though matches are fierce, Sensei teaches that competition is the best way to improve your skill. Win or lose, ninjas always remain loyal allies, so remember to tell your opponent "good game!"
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_691">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/691.swf">691</a>
</td>
<td>Earning the Water Suit
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_691.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125427" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 691.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_691.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_691.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125427"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="43" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 5.png" data-image-key="Burbank_5.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f1/Burbank_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045454" class="mw-file-description image" title="Orange"><img alt="Orange" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ orange card.png" data-image-key="CJ_orange_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454"></a><figcaption>Orange</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Each part of the Water Ninja Suit is a symbol of skill. They must be earned in order  first the <a href="/wiki/Wave_Sandals" title="Wave Sandals">Water Sandals</a>, then the <a href="/wiki/Waterfall_Coat" title="Waterfall Coat">Waterfall Coat</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Torrent_Mask" title="Torrent Mask">Torrent Mask</a>. Once you earn the <a href="/wiki/Helmet_of_Oceans" title="Helmet of Oceans">Helmet of Oceans</a>, you're ready to face Sensei.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_692">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/692.swf">692</a>
</td>
<td>Water Pumping Gadget
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/cf/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_692.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125438" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 692.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_692.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/c/cf/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_692.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125438"></a></span>

<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045400" class="mw-file-description image" title="Blue"><img alt="Blue" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ blue card.png" data-image-key="CJ_blue_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/0/0e/CJ_blue_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045400"></a><figcaption>Blue</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>A rainstorm drenched the island in November 2010. At Sensei's request, workers set up machines to pump rainwater up to the Dojo. The machines ran on snowballs and Fire Ninja flames!
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_693">

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>During November 2010, everyone helped pump rainwater up to the Dojo. This water was needed to build a new Dojo for Water Ninja training. For a week, much of the island was covered in pipes and water tanks.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>The path to the Water Dojo begins in the Ninja Hideout. Once you have an Amulet, touch the stone tablet marked with a sater<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> symbol. A gate will appear and open. Enter it, if you are prepared...
</td></tr>

</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>When a ninja wears all the parts of the Water Suit, they will have the power to control water. Wearing only the suit, press 'D', and a wave of water will surge around you.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>The rainstorm in November 2010 was a sign that ninjas were ready to master the element of water. Sensei soon announced the construction of the Water Dojo. It opened on November 25... and Card-Jitsu Water training began.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_697">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/697.swf">697</a>
</td>
<td>Sensei - Master of Water (named "Sensei-Master of Water" in real-life cards)
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_697.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413125534" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="101" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 697.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_697.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/4/42/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_697.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413125534"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="2"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045243" class="mw-file-description image" title="Water"><img alt="Water" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="37" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ water icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_water_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/64/CJ_water_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045243"></a><figcaption>Water</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024944" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="41" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Burbank 4.png" data-image-key="Burbank_4.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/a/ae/Burbank_4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20150123024944"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>During construction of the Water Dojo in November 2010, Sensei appeared in the Ninja Hideout. Dressed in his Water Robe, he helped ninjas prepare... and showed them what the power of a Water Ninja could do.
</td></tr>

</td>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>This rough sketch was an idea for a poster, showing all the different parts of the new Card-Jitsu Water game. We wanted to make it feel like the beginning of an ancient legend or story. That's why Sensei is so big  he's not a giant, it's just for style!
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>This sketch of a Water Ninja was created for a membership card design. We wanted to show how it feels to become a Water Ninja  to have such awesome power and skill. That's why we left off his mask  we wanted to see his expression!
</td></tr>

<tr id="card_71">
<td style="font-size: larger;"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://icerink.solero.me/media1.clubpenguin.com/play/v2/games/card/icons/71.swf">71</a>
</td>
<td>FLOORING UPGRADE

<td data-sort-value="7" style="text-align: center;"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/8b/CJ_Discard_Red_Card.png/revision/latest?cb=20201107164646" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/8b/CJ_Discard_Red_Card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20201107164646" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="40" height="42" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ Discard Red Card.png" data-image-key="CJ_Discard_Red_Card.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/8/8b/CJ_Discard_Red_Card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20201107164646"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure> (opponent)
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"My favorite part of <a href="/wiki/Thin_Ice" title="Thin Ice">Thin Ice</a> is the music. I want it in my igloo because I like how it goes 'beep-ba-beep-beep'. The <a href="/wiki/Black_puffle" class="mw-redirect" title="Black puffle">black puffle</a> in it looks really funny, too."
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>"Over there is my igloo. I saved up <a href="/wiki/Coin" title="Coin">coins</a> for the renovations at Christmas," she explains. "It's empty right now because I'm gearing up to get some new <a href="/wiki/Furniture" title="Furniture">furniture</a>."

<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"Whew, it's been a really busy day putting out fires at the <a href="/wiki/Cove" title="Cove">Cove</a>," wheezes the out-of-break firefighter. "That's why it's important to love what you do."

<td>The origin of the mythical giant octopus is unknown. "I remember it like it was last year. All of a sudden, there was a big octopus... like an OCTIZILLA in the <a href="/wiki/Dojo" title="Dojo">Dojo</a>!" recalls one penguin.

<td style="font-size: larger;">1
</td>
<td>"I had this amazing dream. In it I was at the 'berg and when I started drilling, the ice started tipping! Penguins were like 'AAH!' and I was like 'KAZAM!' It was awesome!"

<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td><a href="/wiki/G_Billy" title="G Billy">G Billy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Petey_K" title="Petey K">Petey K</a>, <a href="/wiki/Stompin%27_Bob" title="Stompin' Bob">Stompin' Bob</a> and <a href="/wiki/Franky" title="Franky">Franky</a>... these four penguins sure know how to rock it out. They get together whenever a <a href="/wiki/Music_Jam" class="mw-redirect" title="Music Jam">Music Jam</a> party is happening and sign autographs for their devoted fans.
</td></tr>

<td>On <a href="/wiki/April_Fools%27_Party" class="mw-redirect" title="April Fools' Party"> April Fool's Day</a>, the penguins were startled. But Sensei reassured: "Pencil Dojo is serene, calm, smart, very cool just like this haiku."

<td style="font-size: larger;">3
</td>
<td>"To the left a bit, no, to the right, aah, watch the fish!" yells the delivery guy. "Hey, what's the guy up front doing anyway? And who puts <a href="/wiki/Anvil" title="Anvil">anvils</a> in a delivery truck?"
</td></tr>

<td><a href="/wiki/Cadence" title="Cadence">Cadence</a>
</td>
<td><span typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/75/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_351.png/revision/latest?cb=20200413120959" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/75/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_351.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413120959" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="90" height="94" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="Card-Jitsu Cards full 351.png" data-image-key="Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_351.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/75/Card-Jitsu_Cards_full_351.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20200413120959"></a></span>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045217" class="mw-file-description image" title="Fire"><img alt="Fire" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="60" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ fire icon.png" data-image-key="CJ_fire_icon.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f2/CJ_fire_icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045217"></a><figcaption>Fire</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/9/91/Burbank_11.png/revision/latest?cb=20151228193046" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/9/91/Burbank_11.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/30?cb=20151228193046" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="30" height="29" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 11.png" data-image-key="Burbank_11.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/9/91/Burbank_11.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/30?cb=20151228193046"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045341" class="mw-file-description image" title="Red"><img alt="Red" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ red card.png" data-image-key="CJ_red_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/CJ_red_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045341"></a><figcaption>Red</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="3" style="text-align: center;"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/df/CJ_-2_Power.png/revision/latest?cb=20201107164444" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/df/CJ_-2_Power.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20201107164444" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="40" height="32" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ -2 Power.png" data-image-key="CJ_-2_Power.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/d/df/CJ_-2_Power.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20201107164444"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure> (opponent)
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>Cadence is a popular DJ and she loves to dance. She opened the Night Club's <a href="/wiki/Dance_Contest" title="Dance Contest">Dance Contest</a> game <a href="/wiki/Dance-A-Thon" title="Dance-A-Thon"> in 2009</a>, where you can challenge your friends or dance solo.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>Pick up the <a href="/wiki/Cloud_Wave_Bracers" title="Cloud Wave Bracers"> Cloud Wave Bracer</a> from the <i><a href="/wiki/Martial_Artworks" title="Martial Artworks">Martial Artworks</a></i> catalog in the <a href="/wiki/Ninja_Hideout" title="Ninja Hideout">Ninja Hideout</a>. Wear them and dance to create mysterious clouds before you turn invisible!
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="11" style="text-align: center;"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b8/CJ_Discard_Orange_Cards.png/revision/latest?cb=20201107165058" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b8/CJ_Discard_Orange_Cards.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/50?cb=20201107165058" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="50" height="39" class="mw-file-element lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ Discard Orange Cards.png" data-image-key="CJ_Discard_Orange_Cards.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/b8/CJ_Discard_Orange_Cards.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/50?cb=20201107165058"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure> (opponent)
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">4
</td>
<td>This <a href="/wiki/Treasure_Book" title="Treasure Book">Treasure Book</a> instrument is a musical masterpiece! It's pretty rare and you just have to put it on and dance to rock!
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Warriors and princesses alike had to battle this mechanical menace at the end of the <a href="/wiki/Ye_Knight%27s_Quest_2" title="Ye Knight's Quest 2"> Knight's Quest</a> at the Medieval Party. Only by working together could they extinguish his flame and claim the treasure!

<td data-sort-value="4"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/20/Burbank_12.png/revision/latest?cb=20151228193059" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/20/Burbank_12.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20151228193059" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="35" height="25" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 12.png" data-image-key="Burbank_12.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/2/20/Burbank_12.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/35?cb=20151228193059"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="6"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045504" class="mw-file-description image" title="Purple"><img alt="Purple" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ purple card.png" data-image-key="CJ_purple_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/7/7f/CJ_purple_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045504"></a><figcaption>Purple</figcaption></figure>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Over at the Night Club, DJ Cadence keeps the Dance Contest going with seriously epic music. Penguins looking to show off their moves can dance solo, or compete with their friends.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>To stop the <a href="/wiki/PSA" class="mw-redirect" title="PSA">PSA</a>, Herbert needed to break into its computer systems. When a secret agent stopped the attack, Herbert was able to teleport his popcorn device into the HQ and destroy it!
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_584">

<td rowspan="2" style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td rowspan="2">Invented by Gary the Gadget Guy, this powerful device lifted the entire island of Club Penguin into the sky for the <a href="/wiki/Festival_of_Flight" title="Festival of Flight">Festival of Flight</a>!
</td></tr>

<td data-sort-value="1"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Burbank_9.png/revision/latest?cb=20150123024946" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Burbank_9.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/25?cb=20150123024946" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="25" height="31" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="Burbank 9.png" data-image-key="Burbank_9.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/f/f9/Burbank_9.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/25?cb=20150123024946"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="5"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest?cb=20150120045454" class="mw-file-description image" title="Orange"><img alt="Orange" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="55" height="52" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ orange card.png" data-image-key="CJ_orange_card.png" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/e/e8/CJ_orange_card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/55?cb=20150120045454"></a><figcaption>Orange</figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td data-sort-value="15" style="text-align: center;"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/67/CJ_Block_Water.png/revision/latest?cb=20201107164837" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/67/CJ_Block_Water.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20201107164837" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="40" height="40" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ Block Water.png" data-image-key="CJ_Block_Water.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/6/67/CJ_Block_Water.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20201107164837"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure> (opponent)
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>When Herbert successfully destroyed the PSA, he celebrated by making all kinds of treats. His gloating would not last long though, as the Elite Penguin Force was soon on his case.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>Elite Agents must learn a number of highly specialized skills to complete their tasks. Re-wiring circuits, repowering electronics, and bypassing security systems are just some of the basics!
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">6
</td>
<td>This Aunt Arctic sketch is fairly recent, and shows her not-often-seen igloo. Because penguins have seen her so often, we always try to draw her in new and interesting poses.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>Rescuers must face these high-voltage sea creatures during underwater levels in Puffle Rescue. They're rather shocking to see, and even more so to touch. Avoid at all costs!
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>Puffle Rescue: Underwater
</td>

<td data-sort-value="11" style="text-align: center;"><figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/bb/CJ_Discard_Orange_Card.png/revision/latest?cb=20201107164739" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/bb/CJ_Discard_Orange_Card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20201107164739" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="40" height="42" class="mw-file-element ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-image-name="CJ Discard Orange Card.png" data-image-key="CJ_Discard_Orange_Card.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/clubpenguin/images/b/bb/CJ_Discard_Orange_Card.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20201107164739"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure> (opponent)
</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>In November 2010, Fire Ninjas gathered and used their powers to help get the water flowing to the new Water Dojo. To become a ninja, head to the Dojo and play Card-Jitsu.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td>In the <a href="/wiki/Halloween_Party_2010" title="Halloween Party 2010"> October 2010 Halloween Party</a>, we waddled through mazes. To open the doors into the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Chamber" title="Dark Chamber">Dark Chamber</a>, we had to mimic the creepy organ music.
</td></tr>

</td>
<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>There are many ways to earn coins in Club Penguin. But the <a href="/wiki/Clam_(creature)" title="Clam (creature)">clam</a> that holds the giant pearl in Aqua Grabber might be the sparkliest way of all. Tip: Don't wake up the clam!
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>On January 13, 2011, the EPF was attacked by enemy bugs. Agents repelled the attack with a new program called System Defender. Now any agent can train in this game at the Command Room.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>At the <a href="/wiki/Holiday_Party_2010" title="Holiday Party 2010">Holiday Party 2010</a>, the island was brightly lit. How many lights, you ask? Over 1000 bulbs shone bright in the <a href="/wiki/Dojo_Courtyard" title="Dojo Courtyard"> Courtyard</a> alone. Sensei really, really likes decorating.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_740">

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>Filling the Lighthouse during <a href="/wiki/Coins_for_Change#2010" title="Coins for Change"> Coins for Change 2010</a> was an awesome challenge. We did it! And the virtual Club Penguin coins meant real donations went to help kids around the globe.
</td></tr>
<tr id="card_745">

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>The last step to becoming a <a href="/wiki/Water_Ninja" title="Water Ninja">Water Ninja</a> is defeating Sensei in battle. Though his skills are legendary, the way to defeating him is dedication. Keep trying, no matter what, and victory will be yours.
</td></tr>

<td style="font-size: larger;">7
</td>
<td>"Avast!" cries Rockhopper. "What be them flares me sees on the horizon? What's that ye say, Yarr? Arr, I think it be a message from me buddies at Club Penguin, too."
</td></tr>
